game.name: SEARCH ALL - RUNES
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the ancient runes on a large location. Ancient runes will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the ancient runes on a large location. Ancient runes will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places.

reviewHighlights.text: Another hidden Object game, look harder at the beginning but is not that Hard! Amazing music, great art! Don't follow the guide, is easy to win! :) On...
Very simple, small and challenging hidden object game.
